testcase.name: Admin Panel › should display admin panel for admin users
Admin Panel › should load and display users in admin panel
Admin Panel › should allow admin to update user roles
Admin Panel › should allow admin to delete users
API Tests › Authentication API › should register a new user

API Tests › Authentication API › should reject invalid login credentials
API Tests › Authentication API › should verify email with valid token
API Tests › Protected Routes › should access profile with valid token
API Tests › Protected Routes › should reject requests without token
API Tests › Protected Routes › should reject requests with invalid token
